title.narrative: The Right to Health: Breaking down barriers to EH

description.narrative: Women, men, with and without disabilities and/or belonging to other marginalised groups have improved access to inclusive eye health in target districts in Pakistan.

participating-org.narrative: Civil Society Human and Institutional Development Programme (CHIP)
College of Ophthalmology and Allied Vision Sciences
UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
